message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you our premium product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I'm really interested in the product, but I'm looking to spend closer to $10,000.  Would you be willing to consider that?

Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand you're looking to spend closer to $10,000, but I have to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $10,500.
